message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope this proposal works for you!

Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm not able to go that low. I'm willing to come down to $14,000. This is still a great price for you, considering the value you'll receive. Let's try to reach a mutually agreeable price.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still looking for a price closer to what I'm comfortable with. I would like to propose a price of $13,000 for the product. I hope this helps us move forward.

Bob, I'm still not quite there. $13,000 is a good offer, but I need to at least get $14,000 for this to work. I'm willing to meet you halfway and see if we can come to an agreement. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your effort in trying to meet my budget constraints. I am willing to increase my offer to $13,500. I believe this price is fair for both of us and I hope you consider it.

Bob, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate.  However, $13,500 is still a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $14,500 as a final concession. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  I hope we can reach an agreement on this final offer.

Hello Alice, I've been considering our previous negotiations and I'd like to propose a price of $14,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while staying within my budget.
